relationships.description: Fred and George are friends who are reminiscing about their past exams and experiences.
Patricia Stimpson was affected by the O.W.L.s exams, having minor breakdowns during them.
Kenneth Towler's breakout of boils was caused by Bulbadox Powder being put in his pajamas.
